functionDecorators.name: computeNextVestingScheduleIdForHolder
functionDecorators.description: Computes the next vesting schedule identifier for a given holder address.

functionDecorators.name: computeReleasableAmount
functionDecorators.description: Computes the vested amount of tokens for the given vesting schedule identifier.

functionDecorators.name: computeVestingScheduleIdForAddressAndIndex
functionDecorators.description: Computes the vesting schedule identifier for an address and an index.

functionDecorators.name: createVestingSchedule
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new vesting schedule for a beneficiary.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: total amount of tokens to be released at the end of the vesting.

functionDecorators.name: getLastVestingScheduleForHolder
functionDecorators.description: Returns the last vesting schedule for a given holder address.

functionDecorators.name: getToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the ERC20 token managed by the vesting contract.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingIdAtIndex
functionDecorators.description: Returns the vesting schedule id at the given index.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingSchedule
functionDecorators.description: Returns the vesting schedule information for a given identifier.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingScheduleByAddressAndIndex
functionDecorators.description: Returns the vesting schedule information for a given holder and index.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingSchedulesCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of vesting schedules managed by this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingSchedulesCountByBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of vesting schedules associated to a beneficiary.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingSchedulesTotalAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total amount of vesting schedules.

returnDecorators.description: the total amount of vesting schedules.

functionDecorators.name: getWithdrawableAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of tokens that can be withdrawn by the owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: revoke
functionDecorators.description: Revokes the vesting schedule for given identifier.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw the specified amount if possible.
